dcterms:creator: Paula Cristina Vaz
Ricardo Ribeiro
David Martins de Matos
dcterms:description: The LitRec dataset contains data on 1,927 users who rated 3,710 literary works. It incorporates data from Goodreads and Project Gutenberg, and includes complete texts of books labeled with part-of-speech tags.
dcterms:title: LitRec dataset

dcterms:creator: Shibamouli Lahiri
dcterms:description: Project Gutenberg is a digital library offering over 60,000 free eBooks, including many literary classics.
dcterms:title: Project Gutenberg

dcterms:creator: Kelly Hill
dcterms:description: Goodreads is a social cataloging website that allows individuals to freely search its database of books, annotations, and reviews.
dcterms:title: Goodreads
